page.title: 04CHURCH SERVICES__EPPERSTONE
page.content: Services are held in the village Church by the Rector who is also in charge of the parishes of Oxton and Gonalston.Each parish has 1 or 2 services every Sunday.Epperstone has a congregation of 25 each week with a few young people and an electoral roll of 50.Other services held in 1985 are christenings(3)weddings(2)burials(5) and Footpath Sunday.The Rector also visits the school and parishioners especially the sick.The elected governing body is the Parochial Church Council of 16 people including the Rector and 2 Church Wardens,who organize the daily running of the Church and fund raising events,which together with gifts have paid for many recent improvements.The Church owns no village land only the school building.
